verses.verse: And all the congregation <S%H5712><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> journeyed <S%H5265><s%> from the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Sin <S%H5512><s%>, by their journeys <S%H4550><s%>, according to the commandment <S%H6310><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, and encamped <S%H2583><s%> in Rephidim <S%H7508><s%>: and there was no water <S%H4325><s%> for the people <S%H5971><s%> to drink <S%H8354><s%>.

Wherefore the people <S%H5971><s%> strove <S%H7378><s%> with Moses <S%H4872><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%>, Give <S%H5414><s%> us water <S%H4325><s%> that we may drink <S%H8354><s%>. And Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto them <S%H7378><s%>, Why strive ye with me <S%H5254><s%>? Wherefore do ye tempt Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>?

And the people <S%H5971><s%> thirsted <S%H6770><s%> there for water <S%H4325><s%>; and the people <S%H5971><s%> murmured <S%H3885><s%> against Moses <S%H4872><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%>, Wherefore hast thou brought <S%H5927><s%> us up out of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, to kill <S%H4191><s%> us and our children <S%H1121><s%> and our cattle <S%H4735><s%> with thirst <S%H6772><s%>?

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> cried <S%H6817><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, What shall I do <S%H6213><s%> unto this people <S%H5971><s%>? They are almost <S%H4592><s%> ready to stone me <S%H5619><s%>.

And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, Pass on <S%H5674><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%>, and take <S%H3947><s%> with thee of the elders <S%H2205><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>; and thy rod <S%H4294><s%>, wherewith thou smotest <S%H5221><s%> the river <S%H2975><s%>, take <S%H3947><s%> in thy hand <S%H3027><s%>, and go <S%H1980><s%>.

Behold <S%H5975><s%>, I will stand before <S%H6440><s%> thee there upon the rock <S%H6697><s%> in Horeb <S%H2722><s%>; and thou shalt smite <S%H5221><s%> the rock <S%H6697><s%>, and there shall come <S%H3318><s%> water <S%H4325><s%> out of it <S%H5971><s%>, that the people may drink <S%H8354><s%>. And Moses <S%H4872><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> so in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of the elders <S%H2205><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>.

And he called <S%H7121><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of the place <S%H4725><s%> Massah <S%H4532><s%>, and Meribah <S%H4809><s%>, because of the striving <S%H7379><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, and because they tempted <S%H5254><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Is <S%H3426><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> among us <S%H7130><s%>, or not?
Then came <S%H935><s%> Amalek <S%H6002><s%>, and fought <S%H3898><s%> with Israel <S%H3478><s%> in Rephidim <S%H7508><s%>.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Joshua <S%H3091><s%>, Choose us out <S%H977><s%> men <S%H582><s%>, and go out <S%H3318><s%>, fight <S%H3898><s%> with Amalek <S%H6002><s%>: to-morrow <S%H4279><s%> I will stand <S%H5324><s%> on the top <S%H7218><s%> of the hill <S%H1389><s%> with the rod <S%H4294><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> in my hand <S%H3027><s%>.

So Joshua <S%H3091><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> as Moses <S%H4872><s%> had said <S%H559><s%> to him <S%H3898><s%>, and fought with Amalek <S%H6002><s%>: and Moses <S%H4872><s%>, Aaron <S%H175><s%>, and Hur <S%H2354><s%> went up <S%H5927><s%> to the top <S%H7218><s%> of the hill <S%H1389><s%>.

And it came to pass <S%H4872><s%>, when Moses held up <S%H7311><s%> his hand <S%H3027><s%>, that Israel <S%H3478><s%> prevailed <S%H1396><s%>; and when he let down <S%H5117><s%> his hand <S%H3027><s%>, Amalek <S%H6002><s%> prevailed <S%H1396><s%>.

But Moses <S%H4872><s%>' hands <S%H3027><s%> were heavy <S%H3515><s%>; and they took <S%H3947><s%> a stone <S%H68><s%>, and put <S%H7760><s%> it under him <S%H3427><s%>, and he sat thereon <S%H175><s%>; and Aaron and Hur <S%H2354><s%> stayed up <S%H8551><s%> his hands <S%H3027><s%>, the one on the one side <S%H259><s%>, and the other on the other side <S%H259><s%>; And his hands <S%H3027><s%> were steady <S%H530><s%> until the going down <S%H935><s%> of the sun <S%H8121><s%>.
And Joshua <S%H3091><s%> discomfited <S%H2522><s%> Amalek <S%H6002><s%> and his people <S%H5971><s%> with the edge <S%H6310><s%> of the sword <S%H2719><s%>.

And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, Write <S%H3789><s%> this for a memorial <S%H2146><s%> in a book <S%H5612><s%>, and rehearse <S%H7760><s%> it in the ears <S%H241><s%> of Joshua <S%H3091><s%>: that I will utterly <S%H4229><s%> blot out <S%H4229><s%> the remembrance <S%H2143><s%> of Amalek <S%H6002><s%> from under heaven <S%H8064><s%>.
And Moses <S%H4872><s%> built <S%H1129><s%> an altar <S%H4196><s%>, and called <S%H7121><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of it Jehovah-nissi <S%H3071><s%>;

and he said <S%H559><s%>, Jehovah <S%H3050><s%> hath sworn <S%H3027><s%>: Jehovah <S%H3050><s%> will have war <S%H4421><s%> with Amalek <S%H6002><s%> from generation <S%H1755><s%> to generation <S%H1755><s%>.
